import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../css/f_log.css';import eye1 from'../css/eye1.png';import eye2 from'../css/eye2.png';import Loader from'../components/Loader';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FacultyLogin(){const[showNotification,setShowNotification]=useState(false);const[passwordVisible,setPasswordVisible]=useState(false);const[fac_id,setFacId]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[errorMessage,setErrorMessage]=useState('');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);// ✅ Fix for loader state
